moves.1. f4: This can be a bad move to start with
moves.4... Nxe4: Instead I take his e pawn
moves.5... Nf6 6. d4: he tempts me with his d pawn
moves.6... Bb4+: So i put him in check
moves.11. Ng5 Qe7 12. Nd2: I notice his f pawn is defenceless
moves.12... Bxf4 13. Ngf3: a bit of a pointless move
moves.13... g5 14. g3: that would have been a better move
moves.17... Bxc1 18. Rh2 Na5: I try to get his bishop
moves.19. Bc2: So now i have the opportunity to take his rook
moves.19... Bxb2 20. Qe3 Nd5: I wait and try to put his queen in danger
moves.23. Bxh7 d6: I put his queen in more danger
moves.25. Bg6+: But this time I made the mistake
moves.25... Kd8 26. Qd3 Rg8: Again, putting the bishop in danger
moves.27. h5: I thought he would make that move
moves.27... c5 28. dxc5 Nc4 29. Qd1: He goes right where i want him
moves.29... Nb2 30. Qc1 Nxc3+: I was lazy on that move and wasn't concentrating
moves.31. Qxc3 Be4: But now i can finally take his knight
moves.36. Qxa1 Qg5+ 37. Kd4 Qf6+: I have finally taken his queen
